surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: But we usually mean by it the immediate, the nuclear family, with some extension.
sentences.chinese: 但通常都是指直系親屬，核心家庭，少量分支。

sentences.english: My immediate family lives on the other side of the country.
sentences.chinese: 我的直系親屬生活在另一邊的國家。

sentences.english: It occurs three to five times more frequently in first-degree relatives of RLS sufferers.
sentences.chinese: 在患者的直系親屬中，發病率要高上三五倍。

sentences.english: Family is the center of everything, and not just our immediate family.
sentences.chinese: 家庭是一切的中心，不只是我們的直系親屬。

sentences.english: The contestant must not be an employee or immediate family of an employee of Fairchild Group.
sentences.chinese: 參加者不可爲新時代集團之僱員及直系親屬。

sentences.english: "Well, do you have any close relatives?"the nun essayed.
sentences.chinese: “那麼，你有直系親屬嗎？”修女試探着問道。

sentences.english: Only immediate family members attended the funeral.
sentences.chinese: 只有直系親屬過來參加了葬禮。

definition: to repay a debt in full/to redeem/to clear
the right to be elected/the right to stand for election
to support/to provide support for/to maintain
